sentences.sContent: Then we could go dip ourselves in any color we wanted.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then we could go dip ourselves in any color we wanted.
sentences.sCn: 那样我们就可以想要什么颜色就浸在什么颜色里了。

sentences.sContent: Topped with Parmesan cheese, no one will ever know this hot white bean and artichoke dip is healthy.
sentences.sContent_eng: Topped with Parmesan cheese, no one will ever know this hot white bean and artichoke dip is healthy.
sentences.sCn: 把意大利干酪铺在顶上，没有人会知道这热浸白豆和朝鲜蓟是很健康的。

synos.tran: 下沉，下降；倾斜；浸渍，蘸湿

phrases.pCn: 电压骤降；电压突跌；电压下降；电压瞬时跌落
[口语]去(河、海水里等)洗个澡，泡一泡
n. 浸焊；浸入焊接；沉浸钎焊

words.tran: 长柄勺；浸染工；[鸟] 河鸟

remMethod.val: 发音像“deep” → 在深水里浸一浸 → 浸， 蘸

trans.tranOther: to put something into a liquid and lift it out again
